thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Karen Tracy, Director of Business Development, Message Systems, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Karen Tracy, Director of Business Development, Message Systems, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Karen Tracy, Director of Business Development, Message Systems, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Karen Tracy selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Karen Tracy as a 2015-2016 inductee into the NAPW VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. With more than 770,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters, NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women.
“I’m pleased to recognize Karen with this important honor,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her perseverance, work ethic and leadership qualities are an inspiration to all women.”
Karen Tracy is justifiably proud of her achievements with Message Systems . As Director of Business Development, she has been able to align her professional beliefs with a company whose corporate values reflect her own dedication to excellence. Her strong work ethic does not go unnoticed and she exemplifies the integrity, customer care, mutual respect and inclusivity that is known throughout the company.
Ms. Tracy’s skills and areas of expertise include client-relationship building, strategic planning, all messaging for high-volume texts, SMS, alliance channels, business development and strategy, and communication. She helps the company’s growth through innovative ideas and implementation, while managing a large scale of partnerships for additional revenue. Message Systems is a preferred choice worldwide for cloud businesses, email service providers, telecom companies and large enterprises that depends on email to drive revenue.
As a Director in Message Systems, Ms. Tracy helps other companies by providing the flexibility, deliverability and control they need to drive the highest possible customer engagement for their business. She continues to develop successful client relationships and would like to grow and manage large scale partnerships for Message Systems.
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/NAPW/CAMessaging/prweb12942296.htm
